caption.center: (Re Ryan Darden v. State of Alabama).

opinion.posture: Petition for writ of Certiorari to the Court of Criminal Appeals (6 Div. 126). Appeal from the Circuit Court, Jefferson County, Nos. CC-88-3539 to CC-88-3541, CC-88-3545 to CC-88-3547, CC-88-3637 and CC-88-3638, James S. Garrett, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Roger C. Appell, Birmingham, for petitioner.
Don Siegelman, Atty. Gen., for respondent.
opinion.opinion_text:
Our denial of the writ should not be understood as approving or disapproving the language or statements of law contained in the opinion of the Court of Criminal Appeals. 571 So.2d 1272. See Cooper v. State, 287 Ala. 728, 252 So.2d 108 (1971).
WRIT DENIED.
HORNSBY, C.J., and JONES, ALMON and STEAGALL, JJ., concur.
